name: Subliminal Manipulation Detection
description: Recognizing and countering subliminal messaging and subconscious influence tactics.

cards.title: Identifying Subliminal Messaging
cards.description: Detecting hidden cues in media, language, and visual stimuli designed to manipulate.
cards.bulletpoints: Analyzing imagery frequency, backmasking awareness, unconscious suggestion detection

cards.title: Breaking Subliminal Conditioning
cards.description: Methods to deprogram subconscious manipulations and restore independent thought.
cards.bulletpoints: Reverse conditioning techniques, exposure-based desensitization, active critical awareness drills
